definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Auto power spectrum of the periodic and quasi-periodic solution has been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了週期解和準週期解的自相關功率譜線。

sentences.english: The major use of this spectrograph is to observe the CO molecular spectral lines from dark clouds in the Galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於南天暗星雲中一氧化碳分子譜線的觀測研究。

sentences.english: It is observed that all of the chlorides added to the oxide sample increased the line intensities.
sentences.chinese: 實驗中觀察到各種氯化物均能增強譜線強度。

sentences.english: The full width at half maximum (FWHM) of spectral line was obviously broadened.
sentences.chinese: 同時，加入氬氣後上述譜線的半寬度明顯加大。

sentences.english: During unsaturated growth, the width of the spectral profile will decrease .
sentences.chinese: 在非飽和增長期間，譜線輪廓的寬度將減小。

sentences.english: It's plastered with absorption lines, and each of them can be identified.
sentences.chinese: 它和吸收譜線混雜，每一條都能辨認出來。

sentences.english: OK Is everyone seeing that? Yeah, pretty much. OK.
sentences.chinese: 分立的各個譜線，有看到的嗎？有很多。

sentences.english: In astronomical situations, the natural line width is seldom directly observed.
sentences.chinese: 在天文學研究中，譜線固有寬度很少能直接觀測到。

sentences.english: Whose linewidths are each smaller than the natural linewidth and cavity decay rate.
sentences.chinese: 這些線寬小於譜線的自然線寬和腔場的衰減率。

sentences.english: And, sure enough, we see the splitting.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，我們就必然能看到譜線的分裂了。

sentences.english: METHODS A group of ultraviolet spectral was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用中藥紫外譜線組法進行鑑別。

sentences.english: It is suggested that laser intracavity intensity could be a criterion determining the competition ability of both the competing laser bands.
sentences.chinese: 提出了以腔內光強作爲衡量譜線競爭能力大小的標準。
